name: Space Journey (itch) (MichaelMXY)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project

Modifications:

1. New enemy(the boss)

     -the boss has 4 parts, each part has one weapon(gun)

2. Tips for each level

3. Added some background music created by myself (BGM of the main menu, lv.4 and bonus level)

4. Bigger field

5. New game mechanics

6. New levels and eastern egg

7. Improved bullets, scenes, music volume, enemies and player's lives, health, and speed.  

8. The sound effect might be weird in Bonus Level because I added too many enemy bullets. That is not a bug, it's a feature.

Have Fun, Enjoy my game

Created by Xiangyu Meng

--Special Thanks to Ziyu Hao for helping me improved my music creation.
